title: Shocked family find a dead puppy in their crab pots near Bundaberg's Strathdees Boat Ramp
text:
A family is reeling from the shock of a horrifying discovery inside their crab pots left at a popular fishing spot.

Mystery surrounds how a dead puppy ended up trapped inside one of the pots at the Strathdees Boat Ramp near Bundaberg in central Queensland on the weekend.

The pots were placed in the water at Rubyana Creek near the boat ramp on Saturday afternoon, NewsMail reported.

A family checked their crab pots (stock image) on Sunday and found a dead dog inside

The family returned the following morning to check their pots and were confronted with a sickening discovery.

A woman, which the publication chose not to name, took to social media to express her shock over her family's gruesome find.

'Was a terrible, sad thing to (see) how many crabs were in and to get a drowned puppy … so sad and utterly disgusted,' she wrote.

A Queensland Police spokesman told Daily Mail Australia they were unaware of the incident.
description: Mystery surrounds how a dead puppy ended up trapped inside one of the pots at the Strathdees Boat Ramp near Bundaberg in central Queensland on the weekend.
authors: Kylie Stevens For Daily Mail Australia
